previous.excerpt: Amplication is an open source development tool. It helps you develop quality Node.js applications without spending time on repetitive coding tasks.
previous.title: Amplication - Instantly generate Node.js apps with GraphQL and REST API

next.excerpt: Nacapi creates a well documented API from any kind of JSON: - Paste your JSON file on the console - Create your unique API - GET, POST, PUT, DELETE http methods are supported - Perform operations: random, filtering, limit, sorting (and more coming soon)
next.title: Nacapi - Turn your JSON into a restful API
